代码块复制和高亮显示测试 public class HelloWorld { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello, world!"); } } This is the first footnote. ↩︎
Here’s one with multiple paragraphs and code.
Indent paragraphs to include them in the footnote.
{ my code }
Add as many paragraphs as you like. ↩︎
